author: Frank Rich
title: Frank Rich: What a Plague Reveals
description: Cold-blooded recklessness about the coronavirus pandemic has hardly been limited to President Trump and his acolytes.
content: Most weeks, New York Magazine writer-at-large Frank Rich speaks with contributor Alex Carp about the biggest stories in politics and culture. Today, the argument, both from the White House and supposed centrists outside of it, that America should prioritize t… [+7006 chars]
